description: Try our easy to follow Pork Wontons In Chilli Broth recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pork Wontons In Chilli Broth Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g Qukes baby cucumbers, cut into sticks crispy shallots and coriander leaves (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine pork, soy, ginger, stock powder, sesame oil, egg and chopped onion in a medium bowl. Using clean hands, mix pork mixture in one direction for 2 minutes or until liquid is absorbed and pork is springy and slightly sticky. Season with a pinch of white pepper, then mix once more to combine.

Place 2 tsp mixture in centre of 1 wrapper. Dip finger in water and wet edge of wrapper, then bring pointed ends together to make a triangle. Cross over 2 bottom ends of triangle, then use a a little more water to seal. Repeat process with remaining pork mixture and wrappers.
Add chilli oil and stock to a small saucepan and bring to the boil over medium heat. Remove from heat and set aside.
Bring a large pot of water to the boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer. Add wontons, in 2 batches, then cook for 6 minutes. Drain, then combine in a large bowl with chilli broth.
Divide wontons among bowls. Top with baby cucumbers, shallots, coriander and sliced spring onion.
